story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Goldman Sachs (GS.N) on Wednesday sold $2.25 billion in 10-year subordinated global notes, said the investment bank, which was sole lead manager. The notes were priced to yield 0.96 percentage point over U.S. Treasuries.
story.title: goldman sachs sells $ 2 . 25 bln 10 - yr subordinated notes
